name: df-clat
body: |- wceq(ccla, crab(s0, cpo, wa(wceq(cdm(cfv(club, cv(s0))), cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(s0)))), wceq(cdm(cfv(cglb, cv(s0))), cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(s0)))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ CLat = { s0 ∈ Poset |(dom((lub ` s0))= P((Base ` s0))∧ dom((glb ` s0))= P((Base ` s0)))}
comment: Define the class of all complete lattices, where every subset of the base set has an LUB and a GLB. (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2012.) (Revised by NM, 12-Sep-2018.)
